page.title: 03Playground Games, Wombourne
page.content: {Kiss'n Catch} We have two teams.One team is out and the other team has to chase them.(It is usually the boys who are out and the girls chasing.)When one of the girls catches a boy,the girl has to kiss the boy on the cheek.Then she brings him to den.We do that until the end of break. {Skipping} The girls skip over a long rope. When they jump we all sing skipping rhymes. The rope keeps up with the rhythm. {Ball games} The boys play football with tennis balls. They take off their blazers and use them for the goalposts. Sometimes the girls play rounders on the grass. Both boys and girls play Kingball. One person starts with the ball. He has to throw the ball at the others. If they are hit they help with the throwing. This continues until the King is left.
